Introduction

Kim Seokyoung (김서경) is the Main Dancer and Vocalist of the Girl Group GWSN under The Wave Music. She was first known for appearing on the survival show Produce 101 and being a member of the Dance Avengers "Bang Bang" group. She may have been eliminated in Produce 101 but she eventually found her home in Kiwi Pop Entertainment. Although she was to be the first member who signed up with Kiwi Pop predebut, she was contacted to debut with GWSN last after almost leaving the agency.

Fun facts

1
Seokyoung has a YouTube channel called "Dancing Kitty". She wore a cat costime that hid her face and filmed herself dancing to various songs. She gave clues at the end of every video so that viewers could guess who she is and what group she's from. In December of 2019 she finally showed herself. Since then she has also uploaded dance tutorials and challenges with GWSN members taking part.
…
2
Seokyoung used to rap in early GWSN's songs and stages instead of Miya, who didn't know Korean well at that time.
…
3
Seokyoung keeps a journal. She made a video for GWSN's "Wish On Tree" series, where she and Minju decorated journals.
…
4
One of Seokyoung's hobbies is ASMR. She made a few videos for GWSN's YouTube channel.
…
5
In GWSN's lore, Seokyoung's item is a necklace.
…
6
In GWSN's lore, Seokyoung's assigned creature is a squirrel.
…
7
Seokyoung is the shortest member of GWSN.
…
